attributes.action: make it unlawful to sell a motor vehicle to anyone who cannot produce a valid license for the type of vehicle being purchased and incorporate the License number into the DVLA registration records
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A motor vehicle has the potential to kill or injure you would not sell a gun to someone unless they hold a fire arms license so why sell a car to someone without a Driving License. the incorporating of the license number on the DVLA registration may help to cut down on the amount of false names and addresses used to buy and register vehicles under.
